thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: China says will take more steps to lower corporate leverage level

author: Reuters Editorial
title: China says will take more steps to lower corporate leverage level
text:
BEIJING (Reuters) - China will take more measures, including market-based debt-to-equity swaps, to lower corporate leverage levels, state radio Quote: d a cabinet meeting as saying on Wednesday.
The government will roll out a mechanism to restrain assets and liabilities of state-owned companies, encourage introducing strategic investment and push forward mixed ownership reform, it said.
Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Kim Coghill
